name: openscoreboard
description: Open Scoreboard is a software that allows users to create custom scoreboards that can be added to live streams or other forms of video content, and providing a scorekeeping interface to allow for real time updates to scores.

scripts.preinstall: npm install --prefix ./openscoreboard-app && npm install --prefix ./openscoreboard-scoreboard && npm install --prefix ./openscoreboard-editor
scripts.build:prod: dotenvx run  --env-file=./.env.production -- npm run build:app && npm run build:scoreboard && npm run build:editor
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others  "npm start" "npm run dev:app" "npm run dev:scoreboard" "npm run dev:editor"

author: Jack McCarthy
